Create a database for Guvi Zen Class with clean scenario

CREATING A DATABASE FOR ZEN-CLASS-DETAILS :

use guviZen;
db.createCollection("zenClassDetails");
db.zenClassDetails.insertMany

FINDING ALL DATA OF ZEN-CLASS-DETAILS :

use guviZen;
db.zenClassDetails.find();



CREATING A DATABASE FOR ZEN-MENTOR-DETAILS :

use guviZen;
db.createCollection("zenMentorDetails");
db.zenMentorDetails.insertMany

([{ "MentorName":"SaiMohan",
"reqNo" : "SR-001",
"queries": "Assessment access code error",
"status":true,
"action": "Assigned"
},

{ "MentorName":"Suman",
"reqNo" : "SR-002",
"queries": "Site Deployment in Netlify",
"status":true,
"action": "Closed & acknowlegeded"
},

{ "MentorName":"Suman",
"reqNo" : "SR-003",
"queries": "Task Clarification - Zen Program",
"status":true,
"action": "Closed & acknowlegeded"
},

{ "MentorName":"Uma",
"reqNo" : "SR-004",
"queries": "Task Clarification - Zen Program",
"status":true,
"action": "Assigned"
},

{ "MentorName":"vaishnavan",
"reqNo" : "SR-005",
"queries": "Task comment Clarifications",
"status": false,
"action": "Not assigned"
}])



FINDING ALL DATA OF ZEN-MENTOR-DETAILS :

use guviZen;
db.zenMentorDetails.find();




AGGREGATING BOTH THE DATA INTO SORTED INFORMATION :

use guviZen;
db.zenClassDetails.aggregate

([ {
$lookup:

{
from: "zenMentorDetails",
localField: "reqId",
foreignField: "reqNo",
as: "assigned"
}

} ])
